title: Questor: buy this Canadian property trust for its ‘stable’ income stream backed by Amazon
text:
“If you want income, the best investment bar none is property.” This is the view of the manager of a trust we have tipped in the past for its yield, namely Middlefield Canadian Income.

“Relative to conventional trading businesses, property is much more stable as you can seek out creditworthy tenants and lock them into long-term contracts that often specify regular rent rises,” the manager, Dean Orrico, added.

Property funds form the largest component of Middlefield Canadian Income and Mr Orrico singled out one, Granite Reit (real estate investment trust), his largest holding, as particularly interesting.
